### Seasonal and Temporary Staff Accommodations – Jasper National Park, AB
#### Solicitation Reference Number: 5P420-23-0188/A
#### Description

Parks Canada invites bidders to submit their proposals for seasonal and temporary staff accommodations at the Jasper National Park, Alberta. The successful bidder will provide all necessary infrastructure, including kitchen and lounge facilities, latrine and washing facilities, and sleeping trailers, for a period of seven (7) months.

#### Period of Contract

The contract term is from April 1, 2024 to October 31, 2026. The successful bidder will also provide the option for Canada to extend the contract for up to three (3) one-year periods from November 1, 2026 to October 31, 2029.

#### Documents and Submissions

All documents related to this solicitation, including the request for proposal (RFP) documents, are available on the Government Electronic Tendering Service website: http://canadabuys.canada.ca/fr/occasions-de-marche. 

Bidders are required to submit their proposals via email to [soumissionsouest-bidswest@canada.ca](mailto:soumissionsouest-bidswest@canada.ca). Fax submissions will also be accepted.

#### Site Visit

A site visit is scheduled for October 26, 2023, at the Woodlot Camp Area. Bidders are encouraged to attend and should confirm their presence with the Contracting Authority by October 25, 2023.

#### Enquiries and Clarifications

All technical and contractual questions should be directed to the Contracting Authority. Enquiries should be submitted in writing at least seven (7) calendar days prior to the solicitation closing date.

#### Important Information

All work must be performed in accordance with the National Park Act. The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement. Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada, and every effort has been made to provide equivalent documents in both languages.

#### Contact Information
